# MappedFile.new_from_fd method

```csharp
public static IntPtr new_from_fd(int fd, bool writable, out IntPtr error)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| fd | Transfer ownership: none |
| writable | Transfer ownership: none |
| error | Pointer to an error or IntPtr.Zero |

## Return Value

Transfer ownership: full
